item.title: Allison add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "The truth needs so little rehearsal." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Allison add a quote by Dali Lama
item.description: "Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other." -- Dali Lama

item.title: Allison add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Allison add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Allison add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Allison add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Allison add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Allison add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Love is the absence of judgment." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Allison add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "Religion. It's given people hope in a world torn apart by religion." -- Jon Stewart

item.title: Allison add a quote by Eddie Izzard
Allison add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "One person's craziness is another person's reality." -- Tim Burton

item.title: Allison add a quote by tim burton
item.description:
"But she knows she has a curse on her, a curse she cannot win. For if someone gets too close to her,
the pins stick further in." -- tim burton

item.title: Allison add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Allison add a quote by Max Ehrmann
item.description: "With all its sham, drudgery, and broken dreams, it is still a beautiful world. Be cheerful. Strive to be happy." -- Max Ehrmann

item.title: Allison add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestation of your own blessings." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allison add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allison add a quote by steve martin
item.description: "I believe entertainment can aspire to be art, and can become art, but if you set out to make art you're an idiot." -- steve martin

item.title: Allison add a quote by Robert Henri
item.description: "I am interested in art as a means of living a life; not as a means of making a living." -- Robert Henri

item.title: Allison add a quote by Robert Henri
item.description: "Art is, after all, only a trace – like a footprint which shows that one has walked bravely and in great happiness." -- Robert Henri
